titles.title: Bonnie Bonnie Banks of the Virgio

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9 v10

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Three sisters walked out one fine day, All the lee and the lonely-o, Met a robber on the way, On the bonnie, bonnie banks of the Virgio. Repeat "All the lee..." and "On the bonnie..." in each verse

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: He took the first one by the hand, All the lee and the lonely-o, He whipped her 'round and he made her stand, On the bonnie, bonnie banks of the Virgio. Similarly

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Oh, will you be a robber's wife, Or will you die by my pen-knife,

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Oh, I'll not be a robber's wife, And so I'll die by your pen-knife,

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: And so he took his wee pen-knife, And there he took her own dear life, Repeat for second sister Then, repeat for Third, until her answer, which is below.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Oh, I'll not be a robber's wife, And I'll not die by your pen-knife.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: For you have killed my sisters dear, You would na' have done that if me brother was here,

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: Oh, tell me what does your brother do, Why, he's a robber just like you.

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: Oh, my God, what have I done, I've killed my sisters, all save one,

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: And so he took his wee pen-knife, And there he took his own dear life,
